title: Google\Cloud\AIPlatform\V1\PythonPackageSpec
name: PythonPackageSpec
description:
The spec of a Python packaged code.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.PythonPackageSpec

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.executor_image_uri
params.description: Required. The URI of a container image in Artifact Registry that will run the provided Python package. Vertex AI provides a wide range of executor images with pre-installed packages to meet users' various use cases. See the list of pre-built containers for training. You must use an image from this list.

params.name: data.package_uris
params.description: Required. The Google Cloud Storage location of the Python package files which are the training program and its dependent packages. The maximum number of package URIs is 100.

params.name: data.python_module
params.description: Required. The Python module name to run after installing the packages.

params.name: data.args
params.description: Command line arguments to be passed to the Python task.

params.name: data.env
params.description: Environment variables to be passed to the python module. Maximum limit is 100.

methods.name: getExecutorImageUri
methods.description:
Required. The URI of a container image in Artifact Registry that will run the provided Python package. Vertex AI provides a wide range of executor images with pre-installed packages to meet users' various use cases. See the list of pre-built containers for training.

You must use an image from this list.

Generated from protobuf field string executor_image_uri = 1 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = REQUIRED];
